# Escalation Procedure

When an incident reaches P1 severity, follow this procedure.

## Contact the On-Call Engineer

Reach out to the DRI listed in PagerDuty. Ensure they acknowledge the page within 5 minutes.

## Assess Impact

Determine the customer impact by reviewing support tickets and error dashboards. Document the blast radius and estimated affected users.

## Communicate Status

Post a status update in the incident channel. Include the current hypothesis and estimated time to resolution.

## Post-Incident Review

Schedule a blameless post-mortem within 48 hours of resolution. Ensure all evidence is collected before the meeting.
